import React,{useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import {connect} from "react-redux"; import { Fragment } from 'react'; const CreateProfile = () => { const[formData,setFormData]=useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '' }); const[dispalySocialInputs,toggleSocialInputs]=useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData; const onChange=e=>setFormData({ ...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value }) return (

onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg.HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself

) } CreateProfile.propTypes={ } export default CreateProfile
